snippet: Same-sex marriage cleared a first hurdle to becoming law in Illinois after the Senate Executive Committee passed the legislation Thursday, sending it to the full Senate.
abstract: Same-sex marriage clears first hurdle to becoming law in Illinois after State Senate Executive Committee passes legislation, sending it to full Senate.
lead_paragraph: Same-sex marriage cleared a first hurdle to becoming law in Illinois after the Senate Executive Committee passed the legislation Thursday, sending it to the full Senate.

headline.main: Illinois: Gay Marriage Bill Is Sent to Senate
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Gay Marriage Bill Is Sent To Senate
